title: The Pinball Arcade Patch v1.22.7 to v1.23.7
description:
THE PINBALL ARCADE PATCH
V1.22.7 TO 1.23.7
BLACK KNIGHT 2000 TABLE AVAIABLE


THIS FILES INCLUDES "BLACK KNIGHT 2000" AND WILL WORK IF YOU HAVE 
THE PINBALL ARCADE ALREADY INSTALLED AND PATCHED TO V1.22.7 INTO YOUR HARD DISK.

HOW TO PATCH V1.22.7 TO V1.23.7

1. Copy the contents from the folder "v1.22.7 - Original Files"(NOT INCLUDE HERE) into the game folder 
2. Copy "TPA - v1.22.7 to v1.23.7" into the game folder
3. Run as Admin "TPA - v1.22.7 to v1.23.7" and click "YES"
4. Wait for the patcher to finish (it takes several minutes)
5. Copy the contents from the folder "v1.23.7 - Crack" into the game folder
6. Enjoy

The folder "v1.22.7 - Original Files" 'IS NOT' include in this package
You can find it on "The Pinball Arcade v1.22.7" downloaded from VIPER666

The folder "v1.23.7 - Original Files" is included for future patching purposes only.

I hope you have great times with this amazing game.
